website_summaries.verdict: Those seeking a colorful, reliable pair of skates for their children should check out the New Dart's with ombre styling.
pros: Skates are generally true to size
cons: Not the fastest speed skates available from the brand

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, smooth ride, must have for skating laps
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, awesome, awesome - really makes skating a pleasure. The boots are very comfortable, sized to my shoe size. I skate laps at the roller rink for about an hour straight and these skates are the ticket. I got them because I developed an injury while skating laps on in-line skates, so was taking a break. They took about three hours of skating to break in. They are very smooth, help me relax and feel in control. Since getting these skates I’ve started skating backwards much more and even developed my backward crossovers for high speed turns. I’m pumped!
customer_reviews.author: John Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable skates!
customer_reviews.text: Idk what to say....love love love them. Definitely check the size chart I would have gotten them 1 size to big. I wear a 9 shoe but 8 skate. Who knew. The only minor issue is the 1 of the bearings on the left skate is loud out of the box but its an easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: A.K.

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: The skates wouldn't track straight right from the box. They would not respond to professional adjustment at the local roller rink. The tech seems to think that the truck bushings were damaged during assembly. The skates are in the return process. Maybe it was just bad luck and a defective pair. I was disappointed with these skates. I'll be ordering something different.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved picking up my skating hobby again with these!
customer_reviews.text: I used to skate in school, and after 10 years, these skates were perfect for picking up my hobby again. The aluminum chassis is the key differentiator from other products, and is significantly more durable as compared to other products with a polymer chassis.
customer_reviews.author: TechnoFreak

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner skates!
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner roller derby skates. I would suggest getting different wheels and stoppers though if you plan on being a hardcore derby player or if you plan on practicing outside. Size runs a little big, and make sure you get a skate key because wheels and bearings came a little loose and needed to be tightened right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Lynzi Mars

customer_reviews.title: So...I think she likes them
customer_reviews.text: Per the 12 year old for whom they were bought ~ "They're Amazing! They're Sweg!" She said I had to spell 'sweg' with an 'e'. Pretty sure that's a positive review.
customer_reviews.author: HoorayBacon

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting skates for wife feet
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide foot and surprisingly they fit me great right out of the box. I usually wear a size 13 in shoes but the 12 fit although very snug in the front toe area it fits fine. Haven't skated In them yet so I'll update once i start skating in them.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Preston II

customer_reviews.title: Too big and heavy
customer_reviews.text: My ankles hurt 5 minutes into using these hunks of junk. Super heavy. Way too big went with another Reidell style. Returning
customer_reviews.author: ginadivi

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality skate!
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner skater and I gave this skate a 4 star rating because of how comfortable the skate was right out of the box. It has a lot of padding and it fits just right. Very comfortable skate. The bearings were a little stiff right out of the box but just adjust the nuts until the wheels start to roll freely. Even the toe stop is good quality. The only problem I had was that if you are used to skates with a higher heel this skate will take some getting used to because of the low heel. Not a bad thing though.
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: Great starter skates
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is they are green/yellow boots with the black "printed" on. So after a handful of uses, the black is wearing off where my pants rub and anywhere I have fallen and they have touched the floor. I keep covering with sharpie marker. Very comfortable and ride well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Me Likey
customer_reviews.text: glad i got these, they a really comfortable adult skate. I am 240lbs and these worked like a champ. No foot pain after 2 hour session. I was worried about low cut near ankle but this is not an issue. I felt supported and had range of motion to dance
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Good skates!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fresh meat and these skates are a good match for me. Color is super bright and fits perfectly, I ordered size 5 men/ 6women and I'm 6-6,5 women street shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful skates, size are mens not womans
customer_reviews.text: They would have been wonderful skates if the size was correct. I loved the color and sturdiness of the skate plus the ease of movement. You may want to adjust the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Hair Diva

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them already
customer_reviews.text: I love these skates! Lok really good under the black light at the rink. Replaced the bearings with Bones Reds and the difference was amazing. The stock bearings are fast enough for the average person, plenty of grip on the hardwoods, I would not use these wheels outside.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Sontag

customer_reviews.title: Awesome skates should be the first and only skates to buy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered some other skates first and sent them back. Then ordered these when I got them I knew I should have ordered these in the first place like I did 10 years ago. Reidell by far has the best quality skates. I put them on and was speeding around in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Opsahl

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner quad skate
customer_reviews.text: Good skates for a beginner who wants to pursue quad skating but doesn't want rentals. They roll well, wheels have just enough grip, and no blisters after the first session. Plus the color combo is attractive.
customer_reviews.author: K Jman

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift.  She loved it!
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my wife and she loved them. Good quality in both the book and the plaque. Good choice for fashion minded ladies!
customer_reviews.author: Roy-E

customer_reviews.title: It’s Worth IT!!️!!️
customer_reviews.text: When i open the box i was so happy I took them out and I had to try them on .. size fits me so well😩 . Even-though I had to loosen some of the screws so the wheels could roll a lil faster.. but further more it came on time .... JUST LOVE IT💕.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Williams

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: Really high quality skates, they roll really well compared to the rentals at the skating rink. I’m extremely pleased with them. The only think I could say that is a negative is they did not come with a key because I’d like to switch the green wheels to the front.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but bearings aren't ABEC-9
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality shoe, plates and trucks. Bearings don't glide as easy as other bearings with the ABEC-9 spec that I own. I think that they went a little cheaper than specified.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob E. Sammer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shares for the money! All of my kids have them
customer_reviews.author: CandiceO

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: They need to be sold with a skate key to adjust the wheels. If you buy these, buy a skate key as the wheels to need adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Cano

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable skate and wrll built
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable skate and wrll built. That alone makes this worth the purchase. The one downside I had was the performance of the wheels and bearings. The wheels were very sketchy as far as traction, gonna try a good alcohol cleaning and a mild scuff with some wet dry sand paper. As far as the stock bearing they are very sluggish gonna pull the inner seal and give a solvent wash then put a dab of oil and see what i can get out of em.
customer_reviews.author: tboogies

customer_reviews.title: Great skates
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in October for my son. We skate every weekend and they are still just like new. He loves them and I am currently looking at a pair for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for fun or derby
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t gotten to use them much but I really like them and my wife has a similar pair she uses for roller derby and she really likes her pair too.
customer_reviews.author: Nobody

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and quality! However, they fit very small like a 6.5 women's
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter and absolutely loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these skates for my granddaughter and she loves them !!! I have purchased many Riedell skates for my Sons when they were growing up and they never disappointed us either. You won't go wrong!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gail R. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!! What else can I say!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit! Super Reidell boot!! Nice wheels.. Will buy another pair; different color!!
customer_reviews.author: Rolly

customer_reviews.title: Dart Ombre
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy skate . But good quality . I would shop a lighter skate for my kid next time starting out. They are good skates though and the look is sharp ! Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.author: Pete k

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter. True to size. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: krystle cervantes

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Really, so cute. A little on the heavy side, specially for a beginner, but got used to them. They’re slightly different that the boot ones, on account of the heel; otherwise, they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Maura G Bush

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. Fit was great. We ordered a 6 and that’s what he wears in Nikes.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Smith

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I use these skates every few weeks at the local skating ring and have enjoyed them very much.
customer_reviews.author: PAHome

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves them.... we had to buy a size bigger than she typically wears
customer_reviews.author: carlene g.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I am instantly brought back to my early teens, and the beloved skating ring, which I have found memories of!!!🌹
customer_reviews.author: Tatprincess.79

customer_reviews.title: Skates for Him
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, great price, SO glad you had the size I needed!!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Tarvin

customer_reviews.title: The break should be in the back.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. But they are wide and I didn’t like the break in front of the wheal.
customer_reviews.author: Lidia M.

customer_reviews.title: My Granddaughter really like the look and the color and the fit she ...
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter really like the look and the color and the fit she really stood out at the skating rink
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The skates seem to be well made.
customer_reviews.text: Just need to order a size bigger. Didn't know you had to order a size up bigger than the shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Great skates!
customer_reviews.text: As always great product I love the skates thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto  Ulloa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Made the perfect Christmas gift for my 12 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love , they are so pretty and my daughter love them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  They're gorgeous!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful and great quality skates. Can't wait to get to the rink and show them off!
customer_reviews.author: David Ross

customer_reviews.title: they fit her nicely with just a little room to grow
customer_reviews.text: My beginner roller derby loves her new skates, she's 11 yrs old.. She wears a regular width youth size 4 in shoes so I ordered a size 4 in skates, they fit her nicely with just a little room to grow. As she progresses in the sport I will upgrade her skates, but for now these are working out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Gingeroo

customer_reviews.title: Bright & Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The colors are fantastic and my daughter really stands out on the roller rink. She wears a size 2/2.5 so I got a size 3 and they fit her just right.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki B

customer_reviews.title: Great skates
customer_reviews.text: Great skates my grand daughter love them brought them last year 2017 January
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Great Skate Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes love them.... slight issue that the stoppers kept falling off will need to have them repaired now.. but other than that.. my so loves them!!
customer_reviews.author: Aleita

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality roller skates! My daughter really enjoyes them! Beautiful color combination too! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: C B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They fit perfect and are so cool looking!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Wilbert

product_meta.title: Riedell Skates - Dart Ombré - Quad Roller Speed Skate
feature_bullets: HIGH-QUALITY ULTRA DURABLE ROLLER SKATES - These quad roller skates are man-made using a vinyl material that gives a breathable, durable skate boot. The skates have a high-impact die cast aluminum plate with strong metal trucks for optimal support.

EASY TO LACE & COMFORTABLE FIT - These adjustable roller skates have an easy lace system, padded tongue, and a Velcro cinch strap that allow for easy adjustments and provide a snug, comfortable fit. Check the size chart before making your purchase.

SMOOTHEST RIDE POSSIBLE - These fun colored skates feature ABEC-5 steel ball bearings designed to provide a smooth roll. These quad skates also have tough 62mm, 93A hardness polyurethane wheels designed to provide just the right amount of grip.

DESIGNED WITH SAFETY IN MIND - These traditional roller shoes are designed with safety in mind. The boot has a low, yet snug fit around the ankle and the Velcro cinch strap helps secure the foot in the boot while skating.

FUN & UNIQUE STYLE - The Dart Ombré boot features a unique fade pattern available in purple-green, green-black, black-red, and purple-pink. The skate wheels also match the color of your boot, so you can look good whether you're indoors or outdoors.
